fields.name: Description
fields.value: Converts the BCD source operand into double extended-precision floating-point format and pushes the value onto the FPU stack. The source operand is loaded without rounding errors. The sign of the source operand is preserved, including that of −0.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: The packed BCD digits are assumed to be in the range 0 through 9; the instruction does not check for invalid digits (AH through FH). Attempting to load an invalid encoding produces an undefined result.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: This instruction’s operation is the same in non-64-bit modes and 64-bit mode.
